results.title: Cytotoxic effects of statins and thiazolidinediones on meningioma cells.
results.text_hl: After 96 h the 50% inhibition concentration (IC(50)) of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SMV@@@ in @CHEMICAL_monooxyethylene_trimethylolpropane_tristearate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C070243 @@@MTT@@@ assays for two more sensitive @<m>DISEASE_Meningioma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008579 @@@meningioma@@@ cell lines (one benign and one malignant) was below 0.9 muM, while the IC(50) was 2.8 muM or higher for two other @<m>DISEASE_Meningioma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008579 @@@meningioma@@@ lines.

citations.NLM: Gehring S, Tapia-Pérez JH, Kirches E, Firsching R, Keilhoff G, Schneider T, Mawrin C. Cytotoxic effects of statins and thiazolidinediones on meningioma cells. J Neurooncol. 2011 May;102(3):383-93. PMID: 20803306
